history.reason: Ho ho ho! A wish not fully formed is like a stocking with a hole in it â€“ all the good treats fall out! You're on the naughty list until you can tell Santa what you wish for.
Ho ho ho! A wish not fully formed is still a wish unsaid! You're on the naughty list until you can tell Santa what you truly desire.
Ho ho ho! It seems Demibro2763 is still struggling to form a proper wish! Santa needs to know what you're wishing for to bring you presents, not just "I wish"! Still on the naughty list for this one!

Ho ho ho! It seems Demibro2763 is trying to trick Santa with a meta-wish! Wishing you wished is still not telling Santa what you truly want! That's a clever, but still naughty, way to avoid forming a proper wish!

history.wish: I wish that the person who wished wished for a wish
history.reason: Ho ho ho! It seems Demibro2763 is trying a new tactic, but it's still a meta-wish! You're wishing for someone else to wish for a wish, which still isn't telling Santa what *you* want! This is a pattern, my friend, and it's keeping you firmly on the naughty list until you can give me a real wish!
